channel.title: Play Varrock (Details)
channel.description:
Ok, Well After my computer died... I lost all my play varrock (which was very close to complete) some of which is still on SRL files.
Anyway i dont need those files back... i started from scratch and i must say im glad i did ill go thogh the pain in remaking it but itll be a lot more organized for me :)...
ill remake the whole script so it will do the folowing
mine fight explore smith woodcut buy/sell(later version) smart chat with players(later version) extend to barb(later version) fish(later version) craft(later version) bank(later version) extend to fally(later version) guild mine(later version) extend to lummy(later version) fire maker use magic to fight (later version) user arching to fight(later version) bone burier(later version) cook(later version) runecraft(later version) extend to the desert place(later version) extends to edgeville(later version) super explore(explores every where)
now you tell me thatll be pretty sweet huh :p but its also a lot of hard work and i dont know if i can cover it all but we will see ill try i might need a team to help me update
heres the first couple of lines
[code]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // CopyRight Â© 2006 Dark_Sniper // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // 1. Please fill in lines 18-27. // // 2. Folow all golden rules. // // 3. By having poccession of this script you must report errors // // 4. Please ask before using any of my code(unless released freely) // // 5. enjoy this script :). // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // CopyRight Â© 2006 Dark_sniper // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const Mining = True; //Are you wishing to Mine. Woodcutting = True; //Are you wishing to WoodCut. Fighting = True; //Are you wishing to Fight. Exploring = True; //Are you wishing to Explore. Smithing = False; //Are you wishing to Smithing.
MineOre = 'Iron'; //What ore to mine? WaitPerRock = 10; //How long to wait until swicthing rocks?
TreeRef = 0; //Keep At 0 For auto colors or fill in your own colors.[/code]
at the rate im scripting it may be done tommorow or in a week idk..
its about 35% done though.
i will release to friends for free but other players may have to but from 1-2 mill... ( definatly the later versions are going to cost 2m)
it will be using erics auth system... i will obfs to the buyers (not the people i give it away to)
this scripts is going to be huge and i plan on making it .. so respect the code and dont use it without permission (itll really piss me off if you do use code and call it your own)
everything in the scirpt i own besides SRL which is free code which i have no rule over if you can use or not :p.
[size=15pt]update team ( [sarcasm] i just might need an update team [/sarcasm] )[/size]
My checklist:
MapWalking: 100% AntiRandoms: 100% Organization: 100% AutoFighter: 100% AutoColors: 100% AutoSmither: 0% AutoMiner: 0% AutoExplore: 0% WoodCutting: 0%

item.title: Play Varrock (Details)
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

lol pyro is helping me lot like telling me to install svn like srl much easeir to update…
pyro already has my latest version and soon when i get svn working so will everyone who wishes to help update… so anyone intrested in getting a 1-2(mabye up to 3 now :eek:) mil script (as long as you update :.)

ill seperate people into groups when it gets big like varrock group barb group fally group ect…

and all these files will be in dif folders like barb in one varrock in the other so i got it all organized :).

pyros message: “im not helping you that much im just handing you bits & peices of a jigsaw puzzle while your putting it together.”

my message: " yaa well this means i dont have to take my eye of the jugsaw puzzle while your handing me peices this means i can imagine how the jigsaw puzzle is going to be before hand."

if you dont get it the jigsaw puzzle is the script :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Play Varrock (Details)
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

Ok,
Well After my computer died… I lost all my play varrock (which was very close to complete)
some of which is still on SRL files.

Anyway i dont need those files back…
i started from scratch and i must say im glad i did ill go thogh the pain in remaking it but itll be a lot more organized for me :)…

ill remake the whole script so it will do the folowing

mine
fight
explore
smith
woodcut
buy/sell(later version)
smart chat with players(later version)
extend to barb(later version)
fish(later version)
craft(later version)
bank(later version)
extend to fally(later version)
guild mine(later version)
extend to lummy(later version)
fire maker
use magic to fight (later version)
user arching to fight(later version)
bone burier(later version)
cook(later version)
runecraft(later version)
extend to the desert place(later version)
extends to edgeville(later version)
super explore(explores every where)

now you tell me thatll be pretty sweet huh
but its also a lot of hard work and i dont know if i can cover it all but we will see ill try i might need a team to help me update

heres the first couple of lines

[code]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// CopyRight Â© 2006 Dark_Sniper //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// 1. Please fill in lines 18-27. //
// 2. Folow all golden rules. //
// 3. By having poccession of this script you must report errors //
// 4. Please ask before using any of my code(unless released freely) //
// 5. enjoy this script :). //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// CopyRight Â© 2006 Dark_sniper //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

const
Mining = True; //Are you wishing to Mine.
Woodcutting = True; //Are you wishing to WoodCut.
Fighting = True; //Are you wishing to Fight.
Exploring = True; //Are you wishing to Explore.
Smithing = False; //Are you wishing to Smithing.

MineOre = ‘Iron’; //What ore to mine?
WaitPerRock = 10; //How long to wait until swicthing rocks?

TreeRef = 0; //Keep At 0 For auto colors or fill in your own colors.[/code]

at the rate im scripting it may be done tommorow or in a week idk…

its about 35% done though.

i will release to friends for free but other players may have to but from 1-2 mill… ( definatly the later versions are going to cost 2m)

it will be using erics auth system… i will obfs to the buyers (not the people i give it away to)

this scripts is going to be huge and i plan on making it …
so respect the code and dont use it without permission (itll really piss me off if you do use code and call it your own)

everything in the scirpt i own besides SRL which is free code which i have no rule over if you can use or not :p.
